997120.name: Cuisine Royale - The Weird West Stories Book
997120.description:
By purchasing the Weird West Stories Book you will immediately get two unique outfits: Male Bandit and Female Adventurer, and also a Red Scarf mask. The story book allows you to pass unique challenges for 2 months. Fulfill challenges and discover new Weird West items in the workshop!

Significantly increase your speed of getting new items by
  • Additional challenges for 2 months, one every day with double rewards! (You can have 7 in progress challenges from this book at maximum)
  • +50% (and up to 150% with additional items from workshop) bonus to the experience you will receive in battles.

You will also have the opportunity to create unique items with the book:
  • 2 gestures
  • 6 masks
  • 1 minions
  • 3 pants
  • 2 sprays
  • 5 suits
  • 1 tombstone
  • 1 weapon
  • Mexican boombox

And that's not all!
997120.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 法语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
